text: aur khuda jisakee hidaayat kare vahee hidaayat yaaphata hai aur jisako gumaraahee mein chhod de to (yaad rakho ki) phir usake siva kisee ko usaka saraparast na paaage aur qayaamat ke din ham un logon ka munh ke bal aundhe aur goongen aur bahare qabron se uthaengen unaka thikaana jahannum hai ki jab kabhee bujhane ko hogee to ham un logon par (use) aur bhadaka denge
